name: jerseynexus
description: Complete sportswear e-commerce platform for Nepal

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:admin
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:admin
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset

author: JerseyNexus Team
